server-setup-description: Connect to your PodFetch server to get started
server-not-found: No PodFetch server found at this address
connection-failed: Connection failed. Please check the URL and try again
server-setup-help: Enter the URL of your self-hosted PodFetch server
disconnect-confirm-message: You will need to enter the server URL again to reconnect.
basic-auth-description: This server requires username and password authentication
oidc-auth-description: This server uses Single Sign-On (SSO) for authentication
auth-failed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials
oidc-failed: SSO login failed. Please try again
auth-required-banner-message: The server now requires authentication. Tap here to log in.
connection-error-message: Failed to connect to server. Tap here to try again.
api-key-copied: API key has been copied to clipboard.
api-key-hint: This key is used to access protected media.
podindex-not-configured: Podindex is not configured on this server. Please use iTunes or add an RSS feed.
rss-feed-description: Add a podcast directly via its RSS feed URL.
rss-url-required: Please enter an RSS feed URL.
opml-description: Import multiple podcasts from an OPML file. These files can be exported from other podcast apps.
opml-imported: OPML has been imported! The podcasts are now being added.
opml-tip-content: Most podcast apps offer an export function for OPML files. Look for "Export" or "OPML" in the settings of your current app.
